CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 22 reads: "They Hold Reins - Officials of the Pony League Division of the Uptown Community Athletic Association are (left to right) Charles Betts Sr., commissioner; Alberta B. Brooks, secretary, and William A. Ralls, president. They are welcoming hundreds of fans back to both Ammon and Kennard Fields, to see the youngsters compete. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Pony League Division of the Uptown Community Athletic Association officials, from left: Charles Betts Sr., Alberta B. Brooks, and William A. Ralls, posed on Kennard Field
